mapper.insert: insert into ssmbuild.bookborrow(bookId,bookName, readerId, borrowDate, returnDate, sta) values (#{bookId},#{bookName},#{readerId},#{borrowDate},#{returnDate},#{sta})
mapper.update: update ssmbuild.bookborrow set sta=#{sta} where idbookBorrow=#{idbookBorrow}
mapper.select: select * from ssmbuild.bookborrow order by sta desc
